entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
